verses.verse: Then all Israel <WH3478> gathered <WH6908> themselves to David <WH1732> unto Hebron <WH2275>, saying <WH559>, Behold <WH6106>, we are your bone and your flesh <WH1320>.

And moreover in time <WH8543> past <WH8032>, even when Saul <WH7586> was king <WH4428>, you were he that led out <WH3318> and brought in <WH935> Israel <WH3478>: and the Lord <WH3068> your God <WH430> said <WH559> unto you <WH7462>, You shall feed my people <WH5971> Israel <WH3478>, and you shall be ruler <WH5057> over my people <WH1571> Israel <WH3478>.

Therefore came <WH935> all the elders <WH2205> of Israel <WH3478> to the king <WH4428> to Hebron <WH2275>; and David <WH1732> made <WH3772> a covenant <WH1285> with them in Hebron <WH2275> before <WH6440> the Lord <WH3068>; and they anointed <WH4886> David <WH1732> king <WH4428> over Israel <WH3478>, according to the word <WH1697> of the Lord <WH3068> by <WH3027> Samuel <WH8050>.
And David <WH1732> and all Israel <WH3478> went <WH3212> to Jerusalem <WH3389>, which is Jebus <WH2982>; where the Jebusites <WH2983> were <WH3427>, the inhabitants of the land <WH776>.

And the inhabitants <WH3427> of Jebus <WH2982> said <WH559> to David <WH1732>, You shall not come <WH935> here <WH1732>. Nevertheless David took <WH3920> the castle <WH4686> of Zion <WH6726>, which is the city <WH5892> of David <WH1732>.

And David <WH1732> said <WH559>, Whoever strikes <WH5221> the Jebusites <WH2983> first <WH7223> shall be chief <WH7218> and captain <WH8269>. So Joab <WH3097> the son <WH1121> of Zeruiah <WH6870> went <WH5927> first <WH7223> up <WH5927>, and was chief <WH7218>.
And David <WH1732> lived <WH3427> in the castle <WH4679>; therefore they called <WH7121> it the city <WH5892> of David <WH1732>.
And he built <WH1129> the city <WH5892> round about <WH5439>, even from Millo <WH4407> round about <WH5439>: and Joab <WH3097> repaired <WH2421> the rest <WH7605> of the city <WH5892>.
So David <WH1732> grew <WH3212> greater <WH1980> and greater <WH1419>: for the Lord <WH3068> of hosts was with him <WH6635>.

These also are the chief <WH7218> of the mighty men <WH1368> whom David <WH1732> had <WH2388>, who strengthened themselves with him in his kingdom <WH4438>, and with all Israel <WH3478>, to make him king <WH4427>, according to the word <WH1697> of the Lord <WH3068> concerning Israel <WH3478>.

And this is the number <WH4557> of the mighty men <WH1368> whom David <WH1732> had <WH3434>; Jashobeam, an Hachmonite <WH2453>, the chief <WH7218> of the captains <WH7991>: he lifted up <WH5782> his spear <WH2595> against three <WH7969> hundred <WH3967> slain <WH2491> by him at one <WH259> time <WH6471>.
And after <WH310> him was Eleazar <WH499> the son <WH1121> of Dodo <WH1734>, the Ahohite <WH266>, who was one of the three <WH7969> mighties <WH1368>.

He was with David <WH1732> at Pas <WH6450>–dammim, and there the Philistines <WH6430> were gathered together <WH622> to battle <WH4421>, where was a parcel <WH2513> of ground <WH7704> full <WH4392> of barley <WH8184>; and the people <WH5971> fled <WH5127> from before <WH6440> the Philistines <WH6430>.

And they set <WH3320> themselves in the middle <WH8432> of that parcel <WH2513>, and delivered <WH5337> it <WH5221>, and killed the Philistines <WH6430>; and the Lord <WH3068> saved <WH3467> them by a great <WH1419> deliverance <WH8668>.

Now three <WH7969> of the thirty <WH7970> captains <WH7218> went down <WH3381> to the rock <WH6697> to David <WH1732>, into the cave <WH4631> of Adullam <WH5725>; and the army <WH4264> of the Philistines <WH6430> encamped <WH2583> in the valley <WH6010> of Rephaim <WH7497>.
And David <WH1732> was then in the hold <WH4686>, and the Philistines <WH6430>' garrison <WH5333> was then at Beth <WH1035>–lehem.
And David <WH1732> longed <WH183>, and said <WH559>, Oh that one would give me drink <WH8248> of the water <WH4325> of the well <WH953> of Beth <WH1035>–lehem, that is at the gate <WH8179>!

And the three <WH7969> broke through <WH1234> the army <WH4264> of the Philistines <WH6430>, and drew <WH7579> water <WH4325> out of the well <WH953> of Beth <WH1035>–lehem, that was by the gate <WH8179>, and took <WH5375> it <WH935>, and brought it to David <WH1732>: but David <WH1732> would <WH14> not drink <WH8354> of it <WH5258>, but poured it out to the Lord <WH3068>,

And said <WH559>, My God <WH430> forbid <WH2486> it me <WH6213>, that I should do this thing <WH2063>: shall I drink <WH8354> the blood <WH1818> of these men <WH582> that have put their lives in jeopardy <WH5315>? for with the jeopardy of their lives <WH5315> they brought <WH935> it <WH14>. Therefore he would not drink <WH8354> it <WH6213>. These things did these three <WH7969> mightiest <WH1368>.

And Abishai <WH52> the brother <WH251> of Joab <WH3097>, he was chief <WH7218> of the three <WH7969>: for lifting up <WH5782> his spear <WH2595> against three <WH7969> hundred <WH3967>, he killed <WH2491> them <WH8034>, and had a name among the three <WH7969>.
Of the three <WH7969>, he was more honorable <WH3513> than the two <WH8147>; for he was their captain <WH8269>: but he attained <WH935> not to the first three <WH7969>.

Benaiah <WH1141> the son <WH1121> of Jehoiada <WH3077>, the son <WH1121> of a valiant <WH2428> man <WH376> of Kabzeel <WH6909>, who had done many <WH7227> acts <WH6467>; he killed <WH5221> two <WH8147> lionlike men <WH739> of Moab <WH4124>: also he went down <WH3381> and killed <WH5221> a lion <WH738> in <WH8432> a pit <WH953> in a snowy <WH7950> day <WH3117>.

And he killed <WH5221> an Egyptian <WH4713>, a man <WH376> of great stature <WH4060>, five <WH2568> cubits <WH520> high <WH4713>; and in the Egyptian's hand <WH3027> was a spear <WH2595> like a weaver <WH707>'s log <WH4500>; and he went down <WH3381> to him with a staff <WH7626>, and plucked <WH1497> the spear <WH2595> out of the Egyptian <WH4713>'s hand <WH3027>, and killed <WH2026> him with his own spear <WH2595>.
These things did <WH6213> Benaiah <WH1141> the son <WH1121> of Jehoiada <WH3077>, and had the name <WH8034> among the three <WH7969> mighties <WH1368>.
Behold <WH2009>, he was honorable <WH3513> among the thirty <WH7970>, but attained <WH935> not to the first three <WH7969>: and David <WH1732> set <WH7760> him over his guard <WH4928>.
Also the valiant men <WH1368> of the armies <WH2428> were <WH6214>, Asahel the brother <WH251> of Joab <WH3097>, Elhanan <WH445> the son <WH1121> of Dodo <WH1734> of Beth <WH1035>–lehem,
Shammoth <WH8054> the Harorite <WH2033>, Helez <WH2503> the Pelonite <WH6397>,
Ira <WH5896> the son <WH1121> of Ikkesh <WH6142> the Tekoite <WH8621>, Abi <WH44>–ezer the Antothite <WH6069>,
Sibbecai <WH5444> the Hushathite <WH2843>, Ilai <WH5866> the Ahohite <WH266>,
Maharai <WH4121> the Netophathite <WH5200>, Heled <WH2466> the son <WH1121> of Baanah <WH1196> the Netophathite <WH5200>,
Ithai <WH863> the son <WH1121> of Ribai <WH7380> of Gibeah <WH1390>, that pertained to the sons <WH1121> of Benjamin <WH1144>, Benaiah <WH1141> the Pirathonite <WH6553>,
Hurai <WH2360> of the brooks <WH5158> of Gaash <WH1608>, Abiel <WH22> the Arbathite <WH6164>,
Azmaveth <WH5820> the Baharumite <WH978>, Eliahba <WH455> the Shaalbonite <WH8170>,
The sons <WH1121> of Hashem <WH2044> the Gizonite <WH1493>, Jonathan <WH3129> the son <WH1121> of Shage <WH7681> the Hararite <WH2043>,
Ahiam <WH279> the son <WH1121> of Sacar <WH7940> the Hararite <WH2043>, Eliphal <WH465> the son <WH1121> of Ur <WH218>,
Hepher <WH2660> the Mecherathite <WH4382>, Ahijah <WH281> the Pelonite <WH6397>,
Hezro <WH2695> the Carmelite <WH3761>, Naarai <WH5293> the son <WH1121> of Ezbai <WH229>,
Joel <WH3100> the brother <WH251> of Nathan <WH5416>, Mibhar <WH4006> the son <WH1121> of Haggeri <WH1905>,
Zelek <WH6768> the Ammonite <WH5984>, Naharai <WH5171> the Berothite <WH1307>, the armor bearer <WH5375> of Joab <WH3097> the son <WH1121> of Zeruiah <WH6870>,
Ira <WH5896> the Ithrite <WH3505>, Gareb <WH1619> the Ithrite <WH3505>,
Uriah <WH223> the Hittite <WH2850>, Zabad <WH2066> the son <WH1121> of Ahlai <WH304>,
Adina <WH5721> the son <WH1121> of Shiza <WH7877> the Reubenite <WH7206>, a captain <WH7218> of the Reubenites <WH7206>, and thirty with him <WH7970>,
Hanan <WH2605> the son <WH1121> of Maachah <WH4601>, and Joshaphat <WH3146> the Mithnite <WH4981>,
Uzzia <WH5814> the Ashterathite <WH6254>, Shama <WH8091> and Jehiel <WH3273> the sons <WH1121> of Hothan <WH2369> the Aroerite <WH6200>,
Jediael <WH3043> the son <WH1121> of Shimri <WH8113>, and Joha <WH3109> his brother <WH251>, the Tizite <WH8491>,
Eliel <WH447> the Mahavite <WH4233>, and Jeribai <WH3403>, and Joshaviah <WH3145>, the sons <WH1121> of Elnaam <WH493>, and Ithmah <WH3495> the Moabite <WH4125>,
Eliel <WH447>, and Obed <WH5744>, and Jasiel <WH3300> the Mesobaite <WH4677>.
